content: for this wall hanging you need 5 mm hook / us i/9 colour a - off white bernat handicrafter 1 skein 4 medium = 1 75oz / 50g 80 yd / 73m colour b - sage green lily sugar n cream cotton 1 skein 4 medium = 2 5oz / 70g /119yd / 109m gauge 15sc x 14rows = 10cm / 4inch wood dowel 1/2 /12 scissors yarn needle dimensions length 10 without fringe width 12 with wood dowel
